verbose_text: XREF_BIBR In Xenopus embryos, a signaling cascade has been proposed in which inhibition of bone morphogenetic proteins (Bmps) activates zic1, which in turn activates members of the Wnt family including wnt1, which in turn activates the transcription factor engrailed-2 (en-2).
evidence: wnt1, which in turn activates the transcription
